overview: Vadilal ice creams has fascination of frozen desserts and for youth. Vadilal Icecreams Ltd. Is optimized to utilization of its extensive cold chain network. Being second largest player in ice-cream industry, it offers the widest range of ice creams and frozen desserts. To meet with the consumer demand on regular basis vadilal is filled with cups, party packs, family bricks, dollies, cones and candies. Vadilal spells quality, availability, variety and flavours as a lip smacking tastes.
